faqs.question: What is technical SEO?
faqs.answer: Technical SEO refers to optimizing your website's technical aspects to improve its search engine crawling, indexing, and ranking. This includes site speed, mobile-friendliness, structured data, and more.

faqs.question: How does this template help with SEO?
faqs.answer: Our template includes automatic schema markup generation, Web Vitals tracking, optimized asset loading, and built-in SEO best practices to improve your search engine visibility.

faqs.question: Is this template mobile-friendly?
faqs.answer: Yes, the template is fully responsive and optimized for mobile devices, ensuring excellent user experience across all screen sizes.
